content.contentTitle: School of Computing and Augmented Intelligence
content.contentDesc: Collaborated with Dr Jaejong Baek as a Teaching Assistant for the course CSE 543: Information Assurance & Security. Designed 107 Capture the Flag challenges using C, involving binary exploitation, reverse engineering & cryptography. Led weekly recitations and office hours to assist a class of 150 students in mastering ethical hacking techniques

Engineered microservices using Node JS for payment & order processing to handle 100,000+ transactions daily. Implemented the AES-256 encryption algorithm to securely store sensitive payment information and order metadata. Developed 15+ front-end features for user dashboards using React and D3 JS to visualize sales and user engagement. Containerized the microservices using Docker and optimized the docker images to reduce the image size by 95%

Initiated and integrated Solidity smart contracts to enable ERC-721 token minting, auctions, and trades. Remodeled REST APIs to improve system performance and scalability, achieving sub-50ms latency in API calls. Deployed rate-limiting solutions to mitigate spam & reduce DDoS risks, lowering weekly call-center costs by $2000. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to build a front-end interface using React, boosting user engagement by 40%

Developed a multitier web application enhancing user experience & engaging 63K users within the first month of launch. Achieved 95% test coverage through unit, integration and functional testing, ensuring high software quality

Designed a serverless pipeline using AWS Lambda to split videos into frames and perform face recognition. Integrated FFmpeg and ResNet-34 CNN for large-scale video processing, segmentation and face detection. Optimized end-to-end processing to handle 100+ videos in under 300 seconds, ensuring high concurrency and low latency.

Architected an elastic cloud application using AWS EC2 & SQS, capable of handling 10,000+ concurrent requests. Orchestrated a REST API for image recognition, utilizing deep learning models & returning results in under 80 ms. Programmed a custom auto-scaling algorithm, slashing down resource costs by 20% during low-traffic periods

content.contentTitle: Graph Data Analytics on NYC Taxi Data
content.contentDesc: Developed a data pipeline using Kubernetes, integrating Neo4j for graph analytics & Kafka for real-time streaming. Enabled near real-time analytics by configuring Kafka Connect to stream large datasets into Neo4j. Implemented PageRank for identifying high-traffic pickup/dropoff locations and Breadth-First Search for determining optimal routes based on trip connectivity

Fabricated smart contracts to record & manage the transfer of evidence custody, ensuring transparent storage. Designed a command-line tool using Python integrated with Web3.js reducing time for evidence retrieval by 40%.

Architected a secure banking application enabling account creation, transfers, and balance management in real-time. Set up Postgres database, created database schemas & optimized queries to achieve faster information retrieval.

I went to ASU and studied Computer Science. Relevant Coursework: Cloud Computing, Information Assurance and Security, Advanced Computer Network Security, Software Security, Computer and Network Forensics, Applied Cryptography, Data Processing at Scale, Digital Video Processing, Fundamentals of Statistical Learning and Pattern Recognition. Served as a teaching assistant for CSE 365 (Information Assurance) and CSE 543 (Information Assurance and Security) for two straight semesters. GPA: 4.07/4.00.

I went to JECRC and studied Computer Science and Engineering. Relevant Coursework: Data Structures, Advanced Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming, Distributed Software Development, Databases, Compilers, Operating Systems, Computer Architecture. GPA: 7.62/10.

Kanishk and his team skillfully managed the development of our website, navigating challenging tasks such as creating a user interface with intricate 3D representation of bike models and dynamic, sophisticated animations. Their commitment ensured timely delivery, and Kanishk's exceptional work with the anti-spam API showcased remarkable precision and expertise.

Exceptional performance! Kanishk is a dedicated and meticulous software developer who surpassed expectations. All tasks were completed promptly and with precision. His stellar communication skills further enriched the process. Overall, I highly recommend Kanishk as a proficient software developer.
